about.intro: I'm a passionate Roblox developer specializing in Lua, LuaU, and Python with over 3 years of experience creating engaging games and complex systems.
about.experience: My expertise spans from simple scripts to full-scale game development, with a focus on performance optimization, security, and user experience.
about.commitment: I'm committed to delivering high-quality code that not only works perfectly but is also maintainable and scalable for future updates.
